text: Dɛnaxan yi luxi alo a yiina, a yi na yibandun, a yi n suxu n xun sɛxɛn ma. Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin yi n nate bɔxɔn nun koren lantagini, a yi n xali fe tooni fata Ala ra alo xiyena, a siga n na Yerusalɛn yi Ala Batu Banxin yinna kui xiin so dɛɛn na naxan yi yɛɛ rafindixi sogeteden kɔmɛn fɔxɔn ma suxuren yi dɔxi dɛnaxan yi naxan Ala raxɔlɔma fata a xanuntenya gbeen na lan a yamaan ma.
